column5: Just a heads up Survivorman on OLN is in temagami. It's on now.  Cheers
Has he talked about beaver fever yet? lol
I don't call him Survivorman I call him BuildaShelterandStarvefor7DaysMan!!

Yeah, ain't that the truth.  He always makes me think of someone who knows absolutely nuthin about bush survival and just barely lives long enough to be rescued.  I think any kid off the street could do as well
Didn't someone try last winter with tragic results?

Feel free to do it yourself and prove him wrong...  or you could continue to make ridiculous claims from the comfort of your living room.  Les is a true outdoorsman.  He continues to expose bear grylls for the fraud that he is.  If you think you can do it better, prove yourself.
a quality tv show unlike many out there.
I really enjoy the stuff he does and he is Canadian which makes it 10X better. His book is awesome aswell!

He's the thing I watch when there's not fishing show on.  I also purchased his "BOOK." Starting a fire with out a lighter or match isn't easy as he makes it. It is tough. I tried it with a magnify glass and only succeed once.  His his shelters is what I'm interesting in. Never know when they might come in handy.    dsn
It is a good show, truly canadian
Awesome show, must be exhausting doing all the camerawork yourself.
I missed the 'Beaver Feaver' and am afraid to ask .   It was funny seeing him with his brother though.  The sibling outdoorsman rivalry made the episode.  He's a funny dude, but a weath of knowledge.
